params.amount: The base affiliate amount (before quest bonus).
params.player: The affiliate receiving the base reward.

returns._0: Additional quest reward amount to add to the payout.

params.amounts: Array of 3 amounts corresponding to each player.
params.players: Array of 3 recipient addresses (unused slots should be address(0)).

affiliateQuestReward(address,uint256).notice: Calculate and record quest progress for affiliate earnings.

creditFlip(address,uint256).notice: Credit FLIP to a single player.

creditFlipBatch(address[3],uint256[3]).notice: Credit FLIP to up to 3 players in a single call (gas optimization).
